data.text: @NeilWC2010 Honestly, I'd rather take my chances with a vaccine vs risking getting or spreading #COVID19, and others should do the same, otherwise we will never get out of this. Please don't spread fear and misinformation. Have a fantastic day!

@NeilWC2010 So the vaccines weren't fully approved in the UK? What risks are you concerned about because I'm not aware of any. Just the usual vaccine side effects. Have you gotten it yet? I haven't just had minor arm pain. Going for second one next week.

@NeilWC2010 Going to share a few examples with you:
https://t.co/jm5acq3t3K
@NeilWC2010 So you believe that children and young people with no underlying conditions can't die from #COVID19? Wow. #COVIDIOTS
